title: Education System: Role & Function üë®‚Äçüè´ - A Level Sociology Learning & Revision
description:
Richard looks at an introduction to the role & function of the education system for your A Level Sociology exam. In this episode, he will look at different beliefs about the purpose of education. Ideal for preparing you for your A Level Sociology exam.

Click here for the full course, or visit this link: http://bit.ly/30id5tm
